error.title: Shot/Asset name
error.description:
## Invalid Shot/Asset name in subset
Following Node with name `{node_name}`: Is in context of `{correct_name}` but Node _asset_ knob is set as `{wrong_name}`.
### How to repair?
1. Either use Repair or Select button. 2. If you chose Select then rename asset knob to correct name. 3. Hit Reload button on the publisher.
